ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... er, I believe it would be appropriate to include a discussion of level here. It of course looks like wanton and inane braggadocio to this 11th level bard
ygData.messageBody:
>Your group only rakes in 20pp in 2 hrs? Or is that 20pp each in those 2
>hrs? If so then aren't you spending 20pp each to go get it at 60+ pp? If
>not, what are you hunting? I can make 20pp in 4 hours by myself hunting
>orcs, with 2 could easily do it in 2hrs.


er, I believe it would be appropriate to include a discussion of level here. It of course looks like
wanton and inane braggadocio to this 11th level bard *laughs* as would my claim of about 3-4 plat
per hour soloing in Blackburrow (NOT that I think that is great, it's not a competition I have any
need to enter not being a powergamer type) to a 1st level bard.

Tszaaz
